recipes.title: Khachapuri
recipes.description: Cheese-filled Georgian bread, a national favorite.
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix flour, yeast, sugar, salt, milk, and butter to form dough. Let rise for 1 hour. 2. Roll out dough and fill with crumbled cheese. 3. Shape into a boat and bake at 200째C for 15 minutes. 4. Crack an egg in the center and bake for 5 more minutes. Serve warm.
